duplicates.evidence: Both PRs address oxlint errors in the agents category with fix classification. PR #7398 is titled 'unblock CI' (general), while PR #7412 targets specific files (nodes-tool.ts, commands-ptt.ts). Both from low-merge-rate first-time/low-history contributors. Likely addressing same or overlapping lint issues in agents codebase. #7412 appears more specific/targeted. Possible supersession where #7412 provides more focused fix than #7398.

All four PRs address identical issue: VERSION resolving to 0.0.0 from plugin-sdk entry point. Titles are near-identical with minor wording variations ('resolve', 'Fix', 'Core: fix'). Created within 2 hours (2026-02-05T01:27:44Z to 2026-02-05T03:47:20Z), indicating rapid duplicate submissions. Same component area (plugin-sdk), same fix-type (VERSION resolution logic). Different authors suggest independent re-implementation attempts of same bug fix or community coordination around single issue. PR #9312 (M00N7682, 100% merge rate) is likely superseding PR, given author's perfect history. PRs #9234, #9242, #9243 are candidates for closure as duplicates pending #9312 merge decision.

Both PRs share XS size label and low-merge-history authors (3.8% and 8.1% respectively). However, this is insufficient evidence for duplicate classification. Different component areas (web-ui vs discord), different fix scopes (UI layout overlap vs ID validation), different categories. XS size label pairing is coincidental rather than indicative of code duplication. Low confidence reflects structural similarity only without evidence of overlapping code changes or shared intent.

High certainty these are duplicate attempts on same underlying problem.
